article_title: Obama turns sneeze into O-Care pitch
article_text:
President Obama drew laughs late Tuesday, when he turned an unexpected sneeze into a pitch to sign up for ObamaCare.



While making remarks at the Organizing for Action summit, Obama abruptly stopped speaking, scrunched up his face and let out a big sneeze.





ADVERTISEMENT

Obama joked with the audience that he might be catching a cold and used that to stress the importance of signing up for ObamaCare."Gotta get covered," he joked as the audience erupted in laughter.Watch the clip above.

"Gotta get covered," he joked as the audience erupted in laughter.Watch the clip above.
